About

Introduction

Hi, I’m Karthik. Welcome to my website. I’m a graduate of Northwestern University, and I work at the University of Chicago studying public policy.

Purpose

This website is intended to house some creative projects that I am working on over the next few months. In particular, I will be writing a few kinds of essays:

  • podcast reviews
  • political takes
  • short stories

My goal is to use this little website as an outlet to learn a bit of code, as well as to improve my writing abilities.

This project is maintained by
